Articles.Content:
I've noticed when using the procedural wings, and the procedural fairings that they begin to visually glitch after a certain period of time in game or after loading back in on a save file. I built a SSTO plane and got it into orbit, left the game, and upon rejoining the wings were glitched. One wing wasn't attached to the body of the craft anymore, floating a bit off to the side. The rudder was also bent to the left & both of the wings were bent at a certain angle. 

Later, when building a rocket I noticed during the launch sequence that the fairing began to visually "crack in half" splitting into a bunch of small parts. My plane seemed uncontrollable once the glitches occurred on the wings/rudder but the fairing breaking did not seem to effect the flight of the rocket. I wasn't able to capture a screenshot of this but I will post one if I do end up capturing it.
